Face spatial/temporal method for post_table

Source: R/cubble.R
cubble-face.Rd

face_spatial pivots a post_table object from a long (temporal) to a nested (spatial) form. face_temporal() pivots a post_table object from a nested (spatial) to a long (temporal) form. For post_table objects, it activates the changing geometry in the long form.

Usage

# S3 method for class 'post_table'
face_spatial(data)

# S3 method for class 'post_table'
face_temporal(data, col)

Arguments

data

a post_table object

col

see cubble::face_temporal() for details.

Value

a post_table object
